content: this men s crochet scarf pattern is easy and suitable for beginner-level skills the pattern creates a rustic & cozy men s scarf it s slightly on the longer side so if you like a shorter scarf you can adjust the number of row i m using brava tweed yarn but you can use any worsted weight #4 yarn for this scarf for more details visit the free pattern on my blog https //mycrochetspace com/mens-scarf-crochet-pattern/
